sentences.en: " I call that'bounce ,'" Robert Kincaid said ; pointing upward.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特.金凯指着上面说: “ 我把这叫做‘反射'.

sentences.en: Attempts have been made to bounce member states into decisions with major financial implications.
sentences.cn: 已经努力迫使成员国制定具有重大金融意义的决策。

sentences.en: Don't bounce on the bed you'll break the springs!
sentences.cn: 别在床上乱蹦--你要把弹簧弄断了!

sentences.en: he caught the ball on the bounce.
sentences.cn: 他在球弹起时抓住了它。

sentences.en: He got on the bus in a single bounce.
sentences.cn: 他一跃就上了公共汽车.

sentences.en: It was good to bounce ideas off another mind.
sentences.cn: 与别人谈谈自己的想法是有益的。

sentences.en: Let's bounce a few ideas around.
sentences.cn: 咱们交流一下看法吧。

sentences.en: Mary gave John the bounce after she saw him dating another.
sentences.cn: 玛丽看见约翰同另一位姑娘一同出去玩,就同约翰断绝了关系.

sentences.en: My father would burst into the kitchen bouncing a tennis ball.
sentences.cn: 我父亲会拍打着网球闯进厨房。

sentences.en: She has a lot of bounce.
sentences.cn: 她很有活力.

sentences.en: She lets us do anything, even bounce on our beds.
sentences.cn: 她放任我们随心所欲，甚至连我们在床上蹦跳她也不管。

sentences.en: She's got a lot of bounce.
sentences.cn: 她浑身都是劲.

sentences.en: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

sentences.en: The ball bounced off the post and into the goal.
sentences.cn: 球从门柱上弹入了球门。

sentences.en: The ball gave a high bounce.
sentences.cn: 那球弹得很高.

sentences.en: The molecules bounce off each other like two colliding billiard balls.
sentences.cn: 当分子相互弹开时就象两个碰撞的弹球.

sentences.en: The song's so catchy it makes you bounce round the living room or tap your feet.
sentences.cn: 这首歌很动听，听着它你就会不由自主地在客厅里舞动，或是用脚打拍子。

sentences.en: They watched the dodgem cars bang and bounce.
sentences.cn: 他们看着那些碰碰车互相碰撞并弹开。

sentences.en: This tennis ball has no more bounce.
sentences.cn: 这个网球已经失去弹力了.

sentences.en: Try to catch the ball on the second bounce.
sentences.cn: 尽量在球第二次弹起时接住。

words.tran_cn: 有弹性的；快活的；精神饱满的；自大的
保镖；巨大的东西；跳跃的人；吹牛者

phrases.tran_cn: (北美， 非正式)激动不安的
(非正式)向某人贩卖自己的看法
弹开，反弹；从…弹跳出来；掂量…

trans.tran_en: the action of moving up and down on a surface

trans.tran_cn: （使）弹起，反射，蹦跳，上下晃动，被拒付，退回，试探，开除，与…探讨
trans.tran_en: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
